pages.title: ORSA MultiTool
pages.text: A handheld diagnostic tool for inspecting ORSA equipment. Right-click any supported device to get a readout of its current status.$(br2)$(bold)Supported devices:$()$(br)$(li)Thermal Heater — heat output, effective radius, fuel ETA, shelter status$(li)Transponder — broadcast state, progress, signal depth$(li)Geothermal Core — operational status, coordinates$(br2)Indispensable for troubleshooting your survival infrastructure.$(br2)$(italic)Orbital command used to monitor all this remotely. Now you have a stick with a redstone sensor. Progress.$()
Iron tip, redstone sensor, and a stick handle. The original ORSA MultiTool cost $14,000 and had Bluetooth. This one costs a stick and works better.
